headline: Tagger Media (acquired by Sprout Social)
overview: Proposed AI-driven optimization strategies for an influencer marketing platform serving 8M+ creators and 300K+ brands, including NLP for advanced content analysis. Built web scraping infrastructure with Selenium, automating daily collection of 5,000+ data points across social media, NFT, and cryptocurrency markets to enhance platform intelligence.
buildNotes: Proposed AI-driven optimization strategies for influencer marketing platform
Built web scraping infrastructure with Selenium automation
Implemented NLP for advanced social media content analysis
Automated daily collection across social media, NFT, and crypto markets

body.raw:
# AI-Driven Influencer Marketing Intelligence

Tagger Media (acquired by Sprout Social) serves as a comprehensive influencer marketing platform connecting 8M+ creators with 300K+ brands. During my internship, I focused on enhancing platform intelligence through AI-driven optimization strategies and automated data collection infrastructure.
